TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {16738=Sep 3, 2012, 31450=4391 runs after 35, and 2354 outside top five, 13743=Amrit Bhattarai is a left-arm medium-pacer who took part in Nepal's campaign in the Under-19 World Cup in 2006, taking four wickets in the tournament. He is part of their squad for the U-19 World Cup in 2008 as well. Bhattarai's favourite cricketer is Sachin Tendulkar. Cricinfo staff February 2008}
